amendment.description: To provide funds for a Commission on Budgetary Accountability and Review of Federal Agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4284 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 48. Record Vote Number: 67.

action.text: Amendment SA 4284 proposed by Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S2060-2061; text: CR S2060) To provide funds for a Commission on Budgetary Accountability and Review of Federal Agencies.
